processing_level_description_presence_ch.failure: The Processing Level Description is missing.

help.message: Recommend providing a processing level description, using the EOSDIS processing level descriptions as guidance

processing_level_description_presence_ch.remediation:
Recommend providing a processing level description, using the EOSDIS processing level descriptions as guidance:
https://www.earthdata.nasa.gov/engage/open-data-services-and-software/data-information-policy/data-levels

processing_level_description_length_chec.failure: The provided description is less than 50 characters and therefore may be lacking in contextual information.

help.message: Use the EOSDIS Data Processing level description as guidance.

processing_level_description_length_chec.remediation:
Recommend providing a more detailed processing level description, using the EOSDIS processing level descriptions as guidance:
https://www.earthdata.nasa.gov/engage/open-data-services-and-software/data-information-policy/data-levels
